column1: Funeral Home with Reverend David Cockson officiating. Burial will be in St. Joseph Cemetery. Visitation will be Friday from 3:00-8:00pm with prayers at 6:00pm and visitation Saturday from 8:00-9:30am at Houghlin-Greenwell Funeral Home who is in charge of arrangements. Funeral services for Carolyn Jean Shain will be Saturday June 13
